name: Storm the Castle
description:
Wave shooter where you defend your castle from hordes of monsters. Based on the flash game “Storm the House”. Made by BlueJay and LakinMariee for the Project Revival Jam.

Est. playtime: 20 - 25 minutes

== CONTROLS == 

Left click: Shoot

R: Reload

X: Switch guns

ESC: Quit game

Thanks to asset creators:
